Package net.marfgamer.jraknet.client

Class MaximumTransferUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.MaximumTransferUnit

  • public class MaximumTransferUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the RakNetClient during login to track how and when it should modify it's maximum transfer unit in the login process.
    Author:
    Trent "MarfGamer" Summerlin

      Constructor Description
      MaximumTransferUnit​(int size, int retries)
      Constructs a MaximumTransferUnit with the specified maximum transfer unit and amount of retries before it should stop being used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaximumTransferUnit

        public MaximumTransferUnit​(int size,
                           int retries)
        Constructs a MaximumTransferUnit with the specified maximum transfer unit and amount of retries before it should stop being used.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the maximum transfer unit in bytes.
        retries - the amount of retries before it should stop being used.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize​()
        Returns:
        the size of the maximum transfer unit.

      • getRetries

        public int getRetries​()
        Returns:
        the default amount of retries before the client stops using this MaximumTransferUnit and lowers it.

      • getRetriesLeft

        public int getRetriesLeft​()
        Returns:
        how many times retry() can be called before yielding 0 or lower without calling reset().

      • retry

        public int retry​()
        Lowers the amount of retries left.
        Returns:
        the amount of retries left.

      • reset

        public void reset​()
        Sets the amount of retries left back to the default.

      • sort

        public static MaximumTransferUnit[] sort​(MaximumTransferUnit[] units)
        Sorts an array of MaximumTransferUnit's from highest to lowest maximum transfer units.
        Parameters:
        units - the MaximumTransferUnits to sort.
        Returns:
        the sorted MaximumTransferUnits.
